class.name: TileSetEditor
class.description: This class is the main access point for most of the functionality for [TileSetEditor].

method.name: edit
method.description: Sets the [code]p_tileset[/code] to the [TileSet] to be edited.

method.name: handles
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]p_node[/code] is of type [TileSet] or [TileSetEditorContext].

method.name: make_visible
method.description: Toggles ([code]true[/code]/[code]false[/code]) the visibility of the bottom panel of the [TileSetEditor].

method.name: set_state
method.description: Sets the state with a dictionary passed by [code]p_node[/code]. Currently sets the following values: state["snap_step"] state["snap_offset"] state["snap_separation"] state["snap_enabled"] state["keep_inside_tile"] state["show_information"]

method.name: get_state
method.description: Returns the state as a dictionary with the following values: state["snap_step"] state["snap_offset"] state["snap_separation"] state["snap_enabled"] state["keep_inside_tile"] state["show_information"]
